heading: HB02522
0: AN ACT CREATING THE COCONUT INDUSTRY TRUST FUND, PROVIDING FOR ITS MANAGEMENT AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02522
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE COCONUT INDUSTRY TRUST FUND, PROVIDING FOR ITS MANAGEMENT AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : NOGRALES, JERICHO JONAS B.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-23
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Nieto (000 2019-09-26)2. Savellano (000 2019-10-01)
3. Madrona (000 2020-03-02)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-09-23
          -The Committee created a Technical Working Group (TWG), to be chaired by Rep. Sharon S. Garin, to further study the measures.
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2019-11-04
          -The Secretariat was directed to prepare the proposed substitute bill to be presented to the mother committee.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-07-30
